description: Calculate the mass transfer efficiency during RLOF for the three binary systems.
instructions: Using the MESA outputs with the same parameters as the paper (Z = 0.0019, initial period P = 100 days, and initial masses (M1, M2) = (18, 15), (20, 17), (38, 30) M☉), calculate the overall mass transfer efficiency (βRLOF = |ΔMaccretor/ΔMdonor|) for each of the three binary systems. Return the three efficiency values.
output_justification: These values are directly from Section 3 of the paper, which states: 'During the brief RLOF phase, our accretors grow to M2 = 15 → 18, 17 → 20, 30 → 36 M☉, respectively, corresponding to an overall mass transfer efficiency βRLOF = |ΔMaccretor/ΔMdonor| = 0.29, 0.30, and 0.43, respectively.'
